item.description:
Foreclosures and "Hidden Market"

Tony Youngs is the expert on how to find and profit from houses with no for sale signs, no ads in the paper, no advertising whatsoever, which means no competition. No earnest money or credit needed.

Tony will teach you:

•How to locate, analyze, and immediately profit from these hidden treasures before the public
•How to make multiple offers without earnest money or proof of funds
•How to have every house sold before you buy it
•Find "high profit" deals that no one else knows about
•The answer to "Where do you get the money?"
•Discover the hidden market secrets

Tony has perfected his own unique strategies for preforeclosures, bank owned REO’s, short sales, loan modification, and the "hidden market". In no time, Tony became one of the nation’s premier experts on foreclosure.

Tony still actively visits approximately 40 properties in foreclosure per month, tracking and acquiring some at each stage of the foreclosure process. He remains at the cutting edge of the latest techniques and strategies and has been involved in hundreds of foreclosure acquisitions nationwide. He has been involved in over 1000 foreclosure transactions.


Monthly Meeting
6:30 PM, Thursday, May 20, 2010

Best Western, 380 Winter Street, Waltham, MA

free for members; only $25 for nonmembers

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association
